mapper.select: select p.id as id, p.uid as uid, p.app_uid as appUid, p.version as version, p.configuration as configuration, p.total_count as totalCount, p.status as status, p.creator as creator, p.updater as updater, p.create_time as createTime, p.update_time as updateTime, p.tenant_id as tenantId, u.nickname as creatorName from llm_creative_plan p left join system_users u on p.creator = u.id where p.deleted = false and u.deleted = false
